import React from 'react' import '../App/App.css'; import {SidebarData} from '../Sidebar/SidebarData'; import Banner from '../Banner/Banner'; import ArtistBanner from '../ArtistBanner/ArtistBanner'; import Body from '../Body/Body'; class AboutMe extends React.Component{ render(){ let item = SidebarData.find(item => item.title === "About Me"); return (

Image Gallery

Bio

Hello! I am a recent Computer Science & Engineering grad located in Sunnyvale, CA. This is my 3rd iteration of my personal website. This most current version is based on React. Feel free to check it out through my GitHub link above. My website is created based on my love for music and for Spotify as a platform. I am a believer that you can tell a bit about a person through their music. Their organizational skills, creativity, and taste can be seen by how they build their playlist, what they name it and what is in it. Spotify's UI/UX and distinct design palette

Some things I enjoy/care about outside of work are:

  1. Finding the best birria tacos
  2. Donating blood (I am closing in on 2 gallons!)
  3. Botanical gardens
  4. Stationery
  5. Believing that life is too short not to indulge in the food you want
  6. Formula 1 racing and basketball
  7. College students discounts

Feel free to contact me at: bee.pisu@gmail.com

) } } export default AboutMe;
